2# Accessible elevator-Station hall to Station hall——the passageway from the station hall of line 12 to that of line 1(self-service)
3# Accessible elevator-Ground to Station hall——Chang’an Road, near Hengfeng Road(diagonally opposite to exit 7), at the west side of station hall of line 12(self-service) Line 13 1# Accessible elevator-Station hall to Platform——near the train control room in the station hall of line 13 at the south end, at the head of the train bound for Shibo Avenue at the platform(non self-service)
2# Accessible elevator-Station hall to Station hall——the passageway from the station hall of line 13 to that of line 1(self-service)
